The Virtual Physics Clinic

The Physics Clinic has gone virtual on Zoom. Here is the general description of how it will work, and a Virtual Clinic FAQ with answers to some common questions.

The part of the Virtual Clinic run by the Physics Department will run from 1-7 PM Syracuse time Monday through Thursday, and 1-5 PM Syracuse time on Friday.

However, PHY211 will have additional help hours as well to accommodate people’s schedules and time zones. If you would like us to meet with you at a specific time, tell us, and we’ll get you help at that time!

You can join the Virtual Clinic at https://zoom.us/j/668912935. If you don’t have Zoom already, you may be prompted to download a small program.

Upcoming assignments:

Homework 12 is posted and is due Wednesday, April 15.

Upcoming help hours

Walter will be in the Virtual Clinic on Friday, April 10, from 9AM to 11AM; Matt will be in the Virtual Clinic from 1PM to 3PM on the same day.
